resources.string:
Our application consists in providing a simple way to view weather according to user location specification using the open weather API.
 The user just needs to specify the name of the city he wants to get his weather information and the corresponding country acronym (ex: "Lisbon, PT").
 Android application created by José Soares, Tiago Oliveira and Tiago Cruz.
 Course: PDM
 Teacher: João Trindade
